data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=whGUkfy1N68Q7kNvgEdeKxN&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDeDrgXnuSbLZNo7WCw4_Ijfp-mG6PI4_cn27vz8tHCUQ&oe=66AE151C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036653_1456869748359051_7076517034930849202_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=XvBh5xaFknAQ7kNvgEW4qPr&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYB4OiOTj9R6ddsq_4o47h0QYVPdtVBJJh_kf8wg_toBOg&oe=66AE1EA4)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003263_961033948683270_8273646164126363713_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=CABX2K5RTwkQ7kNvgGlD6sz&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDfE7Z6VJCjgRjvMPTUx8SWk8g1p0k8AOnnPuhsOKkNUA&oe=66AE0607)

With light gameplay elements, the focus is on the narrative. Dive into a story-rich experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.  

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031579_801519894943640_3850714342256227051_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=DZhEkFQNAlcQ7kNvgH48Zw-&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBS3Yxz_T73KXl9XyIS_rPNSlmpnyMeSOVT8CcO9RoyGQ&oe=66ADF8E6)

![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=PA5oorzdfeoQ7kNvgEO1O2k&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAdVHCctINVzq9AAYJTbk5f-3AXCcY4R7wrTlvnflhwPw&oe=66AE2558)

Celebrated for its cinematic story and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322595_315227141608157_6664541123259039926_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=rutNQygn54gQ7kNvgHrc_i6&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYD9cwJdp-pCNlgfVOUoDWwAdJNABEFS9c1Wf-G2MHvz_A&oe=66AE21D9)


![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=1EgL88Uc5NgQ7kNvgFiI0R2&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYA3Qsc8pOaAY4k2iyKz74bMBpOr10ikeQ7SJqziHim7Ig&oe=66AE07F0)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57569455_779145490949371_5639970595016054333_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=phS7PzdRVqsQ7kNvgEC3yYR&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDtS18ICWO2KcYsqOaZkTgTiTJn0Wp935KOsuMk3py9Qw&oe=66ADF26A)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=6P4elAKov58Q7kNvgFlxLSS&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCEWZl5wjH5okloWJ4WbIWSOij8nyvpTi-Q-HYSK2eedw&oe=66AE0617)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë



![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75251817_478868781249664_4666816330504461518_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=fbFyWNOJ3ZoQ7kNvgGvVvbU&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBDpolV9BtNwt5Nv3gWwQ8fbtitFL5FJHXXUSOBD-jLtQ&oe=66AE218C)
